name: Sleeping Potion
description:
Story

The little witch can't sleep because of the nightmares that haunt her house! She must concoct a sleeping potion from five dreams that are scattered around her mansion. Once the potion has been prepared, the little witch can finally be in the arms of Morpheus!

Quick Guide

When the witch approaches the ingredients, she collects them and must bring them back to her cauldron.

 To move, use the arrow keys or "W,Q,S,D".

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 52.
